oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Unknown World War I Soldier, of the Tennessee 114th Field Artillery, Battery A
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A photograph of an unknown World War I soldier, of the Tennessee 114th Field Artillery, Battery A. The 114th Field Artillery, a volunteer regiment, was raised by Luke Lea of Nashville, Tennessee. The 114th Field Artillery distinguished itself in France in the battles of St. Mihiel, the Meuse Argonne, and the Woevre Plains. Forms part of the Helon Daniel Miller Collection. 1 photographic postcard.
